name: islamic-data-repository
description: Mobile-optimized Islamic content repository (Quran, Hadith, Duas) for GitHub CDN delivery

scripts.build: npm run validate && npm run optimize
scripts.size-check: find data -name '*.json' -exec ls -lh {} \; | awk '$5 ~ /[0-9]+M/ {print "Large file: " $9 " (" $5 ")"; large++} END {if(large>0) print "Found " large " files over 1MB"; else print "All files appropriately sized"}'
scripts.stats: echo 'Repository Statistics:' && echo 'Quran Chapters:' $(find data/quran/chapters -name '*.json' | wc -l) && echo 'Total Size:' $(du -sh data/ | cut -f1)
scripts.precommit: npm run validate && npm run optimize

author: Islamic Data Contributors
